entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[DQC.US.0189.10184] The filing has reported a value for the element us-gaap:DebtInstrumentRedemptionPricePercentage with a value of 1 using the axis VariableRateAxis in the role 9954539 - Disclosure - Debt - Junior Subordinated Notes (Details) on the table us-gaap:DebtInstrumentTable. However, the only member used to disaggregate the total for us-gaap:DebtInstrumentRedemptionPricePercentage was the member us-gaap:UsTreasuryUstInterestRateMember. If only one member is used on this axis then the filer should either:
1. Retag the filing using the element InvestmentVariableInterestRateTypeExtensibleEnumeration or DebtInstrumentVariableInterestRateTypeExtensibleEnumeration with a value of us-gaap:UsTreasuryUstInterestRateMember. The member us-gaap:UsTreasuryUstInterestRateMember should be removed from the value as it represents the aggregate value of us-gaap:DebtInstrumentRedemptionPricePercentage.
2. Tag the aggregate value of us-gaap:DebtInstrumentRedemptionPricePercentage with a value of 1 without the VariableRateAxis axis. This rule will not generate an error if the aggregate value of us-gaap:DebtInstrumentRedemptionPricePercentage is reported.
The properties of this us-gaap:DebtInstrumentRedemptionPricePercentage fact are: Period :2019-10-01 to 2019-10-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:DebtInstrumentAxis=aer:A2079JuniorSubordinatedNotesMember, us-gaap:LongtermDebtTypeAxis=us-gaap:SubordinatedDebtMember, us-gaap:VariableRateAxis=us-gaap:UsTreasuryUstInterestRateMember Unit : pure
Rule Element Id:10184 Rule version: 25.0.0 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1378789/000137878924000030/aer-20231231.htm 8

[DQC.US.0189.10184] The filing has reported a value for the element us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1 with a value of 0.0454 (rounded 4d) using the axis VariableRateAxis in the role 9954539 - Disclosure - Debt - Junior Subordinated Notes (Details) on the table us-gaap:DebtInstrumentTable. However, the only member used to disaggregate the total for us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1 was the member us-gaap:UsTreasuryUstInterestRateMember. If only one member is used on this axis then the filer should either:
1. Retag the filing using the element InvestmentVariableInterestRateTypeExtensibleEnumeration or DebtInstrumentVariableInterestRateTypeExtensibleEnumeration with a value of us-gaap:UsTreasuryUstInterestRateMember. The member us-gaap:UsTreasuryUstInterestRateMember should be removed from the value as it represents the aggregate value of us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1.
2. Tag the aggregate value of us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1 with a value of 0.0454 (rounded 4d) without the VariableRateAxis axis. This rule will not generate an error if the aggregate value of us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1 is reported.
The properties of this us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1 fact are: Period :2019-10-01 to 2019-10-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:DebtInstrumentAxis=aer:A2079JuniorSubordinatedNotesMember, us-gaap:LongtermDebtTypeAxis=us-gaap:SubordinatedDebtMember, us-gaap:VariableRateAxis=us-gaap:UsTreasuryUstInterestRateMember Unit : pure
Rule Element Id:10184 Rule version: 25.0.0 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1378789/000137878924000030/aer-20231231.htm 8

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0189.10184] The filing has reported a value for the element aer:LongTermDebtFloatingRateDuration with a value of P5Y using the axis VariableRateAxis in the role 9954539 - Disclosure - Debt - Junior Subordinated Notes (Details) on the table us-gaap:DebtInstrumentTable. However, the only member used to disaggregate the total for aer:LongTermDebtFloatingRateDuration was the member us-gaap:UsTreasuryUstInterestRateMember. If only one member is used on this axis then the filer should either:
1. Retag the filing using the element InvestmentVariableInterestRateTypeExtensibleEnumeration or DebtInstrumentVariableInterestRateTypeExtensibleEnumeration with a value of us-gaap:UsTreasuryUstInterestRateMember. The member us-gaap:UsTreasuryUstInterestRateMember should be removed from the value as it represents the aggregate value of aer:LongTermDebtFloatingRateDuration.
2. Tag the aggregate value of aer:LongTermDebtFloatingRateDuration with a value of P5Y without the VariableRateAxis axis. This rule will not generate an error if the aggregate value of aer:LongTermDebtFloatingRateDuration is reported.
The properties of this aer:LongTermDebtFloatingRateDuration fact are: Period :2019-10-01 to 2019-10-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:DebtInstrumentAxis=aer:A2079JuniorSubordinatedNotesMember, us-gaap:LongtermDebtTypeAxis=us-gaap:SubordinatedDebtMember, us-gaap:VariableRateAxis=us-gaap:UsTreasuryUstInterestRateMember Unit : None
Rule Element Id:10184 Rule version: 25.0.0 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1378789/000137878924000030/aer-20231231.htm 8
